body.description: Performance that feels better. Jms active, an energetic new sub-brand of performance clothing for active women, with the famous fit of jms. Easy to wear tops and bottoms. Dynamic range of go-to-styles. Pricing as comfortable as the garments themselves.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MORE OF WHAT YOU LOVE APPAREL Our plus size clothing is sized right, not just sized up, so you can count on JMS apparel to fit beautifully and be comfortable all day. BRAS Just My Size bras fit who you are. You can find just your size. Just your style. And just the right place. PANTIES Get the comfort and fit you want from plus size underwear in your pick of body-pampering fabrics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Great for the price. True to size. Extremely comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Size 16, ordered a 2x. Fits absolutely perfect and they’re very flattering. Not as much stretch so they stay in place much better than my normal spandex leggings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Look nice, very comfortable, NO compression on the tummy though.
reviews.reviewText: These had a good rating so thought I would try them. I am a size 18W normal clothes, so ordered a 1x. The fit was perfect. I do not understand why others are saying they do not run true to size, as they do. The capris were the nice matte stretchy cotton, not the shiny type I hate. The material was a little thin for my liking, but did not seem see thru. I did not like the waist band. It looked like someone stitched the top down and then inserted an elastic band. It was very flimsy and had NO compression on the belly so was not happy. When I bend over, the top kind of rolls down. I was going to return them, but decided to keep them to use for hanging around the house pants. They really are nice looking and the price was only $13, so the comfort made me keep them. Not good for working out though if you need the compression waist band to hold the gut it. I would not buy these again, but gave them a 4 star rating because they are cheap, cute and comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: quality is great and stylish. Super comfy and can be used everyday activities

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect workout pants
reviews.reviewText: These pants fit perfectly for my size. They don't ride down in the back when I work out and aren't too tight around the ankles. Material is wickable and breathable so you're not too hot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: these are my new fav leggings! they are so soft and not see thru. no pockets but i can compromise on that

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Will do the job
reviews.reviewText: Pros: fit true to size, above average stretch, affordable, seem durable for price point, truly high waistedCons: not true athletic material, lack pockets, see through with slight bendingFit: I am 5'5" and have short legs with a muscular and proportional build, I typically wear 2X or 3X for bottoms. I purchased a 3X and was happy with that due to fabric issues and waist heightAs a fat person it is extremely difficult to find active wear (or clothes in general) off the rack so it's hard to beat free two day shipping when you have a short time frame. These are cheap leggings and I purchased them because they fit in my budget at the time. They are not really what I would considered athletic wear material but the material does seem a lot more durable/thicker than fashion leggings. They are also sewn as I would expect athletic wear to be- reinforced stitches that look like crap but hold up better to repetitive motion and hard wear. They fit true to size, I'm between a 2X and 3X and ordered the 3X and found I probably could have sized down. They are also truly high waisted, though I am worried about slipping while hiking. The fabric is actually not that tightly woven meaning that a slight bend allowed my partner to clearly see the Deadpool design on my underwear. Not a issue for my purposes but definitely a issue for others. I would not size down if I were to purchase again since they would likely be see through without bending. I also thought they had side pockets which is entirely my mistake, but that affects function. Based on how they are sewn I think they are meant to mimic the look of side pockets which I find slightly misleading but, again, I should have looked more closely and with my budget probably would have purchased anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect work out pants
reviews.reviewText: These are my favorite workout pants. They have excellent control without being overly controlling. They fit well they wash well they wear well. My favs.

reviews.reviewTitle: Me encanto! La talla viene más grande
reviews.reviewText: Me encantó!!Es de tela bastante gruesa, no se transparenta.Ojo con la talla.. vienen más grandes de lo normal.Soy de cadera amplia (mas ancha de abajo que de la parte superior del cuerpo) Soy talla 44 a 46, pedí un 4x y me quedo grandesito 😱Pediré un talla 3x a ver como me queda.

Absolutely perfect! Can't wait to buy another pair of these. They are so comfortable. They are high waisted so I find that they never fall down. They wash up really nice. I would say definitely wash them with your dark clothes because they seem to be a magnet for lint. I also think in the description it is written that there is a drawstring or something? There is not. Not a big deal to me. Also adding a side pocket for your phone or your keys would have been a great benefit, but once again no biggy.The colors are great I purchased the one with the black, white and gray (in a 2x) and I get so many comments on them.
Good feel, design and texture. Very comfy.

So many times clothes that I order in my size are from China and way too small, but these pants actually fit and I am in love with the colour. Purple is my favourite colour! Also the fabric is a beautiful quality and I can’t wait to wear these pants on my vacation!

Bonito pantalón capri deportivo, cómodo y de buenos materiales. Tengo otro que encargue hace 8 meses y si se ve un poco desgastada la tela, pero aun así sigue teniendo firmeza.En mi caso encargue una talla menos a la que uso regularmente, ya que previamente había comprado algunas prendas de la misma marca y vienen un poco grandes, al menos para una mujer bajita y llenita.
